NAME.Nominative: Monday of the Fourth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Monday of the Fourth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 7<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: O Lord, rebuke not in Thine anger the people that have sinned, nor chasten us in Thy wrath, O Thou Who art good; for all the earth doth glorify Thee, and we pray: spare us, O Holy One.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: In God is my salvation and my glory.
In God is my salvation and my glory.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Shall not my soul be subjected to God? For from Him is my salvation.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: So shall I bless Thee in my life.
and Thy mercy shall go before me.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O God, my God, unto Thee I rise early at dawn, my soul hath thirsted for Thee.
